quotes.quote: I look at this life as a puzzle without all the pieces in the box.
Not every puzzle is intended to be solved. Some are in place to test your limits. Others are, in fact, not puzzles at all.

A mechanical puzzle is a self contained object, composed of one or more parts, which involves a problem for one person to solve by manipulation using logic, reasoning, insight, luck, and/or dexterity.
The solution often turns out more beautiful than the puzzle.
Who in the world am I? Ah, that's the great puzzle.
A good puzzle, it's a fair thing. Nobody is lying. It's very clear, and the problem depends just on you.
We are all important parts of a much larger system, pieces of the universe's puzzle that would not be complete without us.
The great thing about America is I've never felt like an outsider. I'm just a different piece of the puzzle.
If the pieces do not fit into your puzzle.Try a different picture.
My favorite puzzle is trying to work out the parts myself, after all it is a solo effort.
Every problem is a new puzzle to solve.
I am a puzzle and a conundrum and a thunderstorm.
The problem is that we always look for the missing piece of the puzzle instead of finding a place for the one in our hand.

The problems of puzzles are very near the problems of life, our whole life is solving puzzles. If you are hungry, you have to find something to eat. But everyday problems are very mixed they're not clear. The Cube's problem depends just on you. You can solve it independently. But to find happiness in life, you're not independent. That's the only big difference.
I don't think there is a hidden purpose to the universe that you have to puzzle out.

Puzzles are like songs.A good puzzle can give you all the pleasure of being duped that a mystery story can. It has surface innocence, surprise, the revelation of a concealed meaning, and the catharsis of solution.
Sometimes the hardest pieces of a puzzle to assemble, are the ones missing from the box.
I like to be surprised by life; it's a good thing to search for the puzzle pieces.
Most of the places I've been, I've been a main piece of the puzzle.
Puzzle pieces don't always connect do they?
Finding your style is like putting puzzle pieces together.
I thought I knew a lot of but in the end it was just one small piece from the puzzle.
In the same way he's fascinated by crosswords, the puzzle of solving the murder is what drives him on.
The nice thing about doing a crossword puzzle is, you know there is a solution.
In every problem, there's a concealed solution, locking itself underneath, unlock, peruse, find and solve.
Man is a puzzle-solving animal.

Unraveling the solution to a mystery story of to a puzzle seems to produce a kind of 'mental catharsis,' since people typically feel a sense of relief from suspense when they find the answer to the mystery or puzzle.
For some truly mysterious reason, human beings seem to need this kind of catharsis on a regular bases---as the popularity of mysteries and puzzles across the world and across time attests.
A puzzle challenges  the player to get from a problem to a solution, but of course, the path isn't simple.
Every puzzle requires that the player make choices, some of which lead to dead ends.
